attributes.action: Plant a copse at Sycamore Gap.
attributes.additional_details: I believe it will enhance the local area and assist in the struggle against climate change. It will also send a positive and comforting message to those affected by the falling of the original tree.
attributes.background: Plant a sycamore tree or mixed copse including sycamore trees at Sycamore Gap Hadrians Wall. A tree for every year of the original sycamores life.
